playdate: 2024-03-08(塞萨洛尼基国际纪录片影展)
introduction: Loxandra, a young woman with Down syndrome, becomes the first disabled person to sign an acting contract with the National Theatre of Greece. She leaves her city and her familiar everyday life and travels to Athens to become a member of the group of professional actors. For the next six months, Loxy goes to rehearsals and makes friends, falls in love, has fun, gets frustrated, and demands accessibility again and again, breaking through stereotypes one at a time.
